TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MonoPInvokeCallbackAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: This attribute can be applied to callback functions that will be invoked from unmanaged code to managed code.

remarks.code: [TensorFlow.MonoPInvokeCallback (typeof (BufferReleaseFunc))] internal static void MyFreeFunc (IntPtr data, IntPtr length){..}

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.summary: Use this constructor to annotate the type of the callback function that will be invoked from unmanaged code.
